short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension counts all the valid transactions from a customers history profile within Dutchie POS. It excludes 0 balanceâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension counts all the valid transactions from a customers history profile within Dutchie POS. It excludes 0 balance invoices and returns to properly count the number of transactions without manually sifting the data from within the POS.
